metadata.title: SEASAT Scanning Multichannel Microwave Radiometer

creators.name: Space Administration (NASA), Marshall Space Flight Center

metadata.description: SEASAT was launched on June 28, 1978, carrying a five sensor payload, and operated successfully until a power failure brought transmission to a stop on
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The measurement temporal resolution is 10/second.  This data set contains level 1.0 data consisting of decommutated earth-located information about the intensity of radiation emitted from the sea in a microwave band in engineering units (watts, volts). 
Output is in the form of sensor data record tapes.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
